name: Mocha
order: Ask for a hot mocha

name: Cold Brew
flavors: Very Strong Coffee Taste, Light Vanilla
order: Ask for a cold brew with sugar free vanilla

name: Caramel Macchiato
flavors: Vanilla, Light Caramel, Strong Coffee Taste
order: Ask for a hot caramel macchiato(maa-kee-aa-tow) with an extra pump of vanilla

name: Matcha
order: Ask for an iced matcha latte

name: Oatmilk Shaken Espresso
flavors: Strong coffee taste, light brown sugar and cinnamon
order: Ask for a brown sugar oatmilk shaken espresso

name: Strawberry Lemonade
order: Ask for a strawberry acai(aa-saa-e) with lemonade

name: Caramel Ribbon Crunch
order: Ask for a caramel ribbon crunch frappuccino

name: Black and White Mocha
order: Ask for a hot mocha made with half mocha and half white mocha

name: Mocha Americano
order: Ask for a hot americano with half the pumps of white mocha and light cream

name: Peppermint Matcha
order: Ask for an iced matcha latte made with coconut milk and peppermint syrup

name: Caramel Ribbon Plus
order: Ask for a caramel ribbon crunch frappuccino with caramel walls and extra caramel drizzle on top, with an added pump of frapp roast

name: Peach Strawberry Lemonade
order: Ask for a strawberry acai(aa-saa-e) lemonade with peach juice added to it and light ice

name: Sweet Cream Shaken
flavors: Vanilla, Strong Coffee Taste, Light Brown Sugar
order: Ask for a brown sugar shaken espresso with vanilla sweet cream cold foam and cinnamon powder on top

name: Sweetened Cold Brew
order: Ask for a vanilla sweet cream cold brew light ice and vanilla sweet cream cold foam

name: Pumpkin Mocha
flavors: Pumpkin, White Chocolate, Light Coffe Taste
order: Ask for a iced white mocha made with blonde espresso with pumpkin cream cold foam instead of the whip cream

name: Cold Foam Matcha
order: Ask for an iced matcha latte made with coconut milk, with chocolate cold foam on top and peppermint syrup in the foam

name: Frozen Strawberry
order: Ask for a strawberry acai lemonade blended, with strawberry puree and light peach juice added to it and extra ice

name: My Favorite
flavors: Strong Coffee Taste, Light Vanilla, Cinnammon
order: Ask for a brown sugar oatmilk shaken espresso with two extra pumps of sugar free vanilla instead of brown sugar syrup and cinnamon dolce topping instead of cinnamon topping

name: Cookie Dough Frappuccino
order: Ask for a white mocha frappuccino with java chips added and whipped cream at the bottom, lined with mocha drizzle and with mocha drizzle and cookie crumble topping on top

name: One of my Regular's Orders
order: Ask for a hot chai with 7 pumps of chair, 6 shakes of cinnamon powder stirred in, no water, no foam, light whip cream, and extra hot

name: Strawberry Vanilla
order: Ask for a pink drink made with vanilla sweet cream and extra vanilla cold foam, with vanilla bean powder and vanilla syrup added to it, extra inclusions
